name: log_softmax
description: Applies a softmax followed by a logarithm. While mathematically equivalent to log(softmax(x)), doing these two operations separately is slower and numerically unstable. This function uses an alternative formulation to compute the output and gradient correctly.

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: The input tensor.  Unnormalized log probabilities.

inputs.name: dim
inputs.description: A dimension along which softmax will be computed. Default: none.
